definition: (optics) defect in an optical system in which light rays from a single point fail to converge in a single focal point
details:
noun
- (optics) defect in an optical system in which light rays from a single point fail to converge in a single focal point
= synonyms: astigmatism
- (ophthalmology) impaired eyesight resulting usually from irregular conformation of the cornea
= synonyms: astigmatism
